ygData.subject: Re: OMG! Abashi changes his tune
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry John , that corpse is Raloon de Illusion [50] Enchanter wearing his Ishvar robe I do believe (I may have the name of the robe wrong but he
ygData.messageBody:
<braaahp>

Sorry John<tm>, that corpse is Raloon de'Illusion [50] Enchanter wearing his
Ishvar robe I do believe (I may have the name of the robe wrong but he wears
a rare one.) The only other bard in the raid was Kaldivar and he has some
planes gear thus is not all blue.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 10:47 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OMG! Abashi changes his tune


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 26 Jan 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
> >
> > p.s. here's what happens if you play songs while your puller pulls:
> >

> >
> > http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/vox_sylly2.jpg
>
> Notice, the only other corpse in the room is that of a bard.
> :)
>
